movies.title: Parasite
movies.storyline: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrates their household.

movies.title: Inception
movies.storyline: A skilled thief, who steals secrets from within the subconscious, is given a chance to erase his criminal past by implanting an idea into a target's mind.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.storyline: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.storyline: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, challenging Batman's resolve.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.storyline: A paraplegic Marine is sent to the moon Pandora, where he becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.storyline: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Joker
movies.storyline: An aspiring comedian with mental health issues descends into madness and becomes the iconic villain known as the Joker.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.storyline: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.storyline: The life story of a simple man with extraordinary achievements who unknowingly shapes significant historical events.

tvSeries.title: Squid Game
tvSeries.storyline: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games for a tempting prize, but the stakes are deadly.

tvSeries.title: Stranger Things
tvSeries.storyline: A group of kids in a small town uncover government secrets and supernatural forces while searching for their missing friend.

tvSeries.title: Breaking Bad
tvSeries.storyline: A chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family's future while battling personal and external conflicts.

tvSeries.title: Game of Thrones
tvSeries.storyline: Nine noble families wage war against each other in order to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros while an ancient enemy returns.

tvSeries.title: The Witcher
tvSeries.storyline: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

tvSeries.title: Peaky Blinders
tvSeries.storyline: A gangster family epic set in Birmingham, England, during the aftermath of World War I, focusing on the rise of Tommy Shelby.

tvSeries.title: The Mandalorian
tvSeries.storyline: A lone bounty hunter navigates the galaxy's outer reaches while protecting a mysterious child with extraordinary abilities.

tvSeries.title: The Crown
tvSeries.storyline: A biographical story about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, exploring political and personal events that shaped modern history.

tvSeries.title: The Boys
tvSeries.storyline: A group of vigilantes set out to expose corrupt superheroes who abuse their powers for personal gain.
